doc.title: Mori no tonto tachi
doc.plot: In a lost village of Laponia, Finland, live the gnomes who build toys for Santa Claus. One time per year, this one leaves in the sky to bring to the wise children the gifts which they deserved. The life from day to day of these gnomes is seen through the eyes of the little and pretty Elisa, the Santa Claus' granddaughter. With her happiness and innocence, Elisa lives funnies and touching adventures surrounded of her family and friends helping to the gnomes in their diary work and in the homework too. At the end of the day, Elisa returns to home to be with her dear grandfather.
